Combat
Hit Points: 63 Initiative: +1 Armor Class: 11 Attacks Per Round: 2 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +10/+10/+11 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +10/21

Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: -15
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Blind-Fight: Reroll concealed miss, no melee bonus to invisible foe, no skill check on blinded full speed move
Death Attack: Sneak attack after 3 rd of study causes death or paralysis for 1d6+10 rd (DC 22 Fort neg)
Heart Of The Streets: +1 AC when adjacent to 2 allies
Outflank: +4 flanking attack when ally has same feat; critical hit gives ally AOO
Shield Wall: +1 shielded AC when adjacent ally has same feat and buckler or light shield; +2 w/heavy or tower shield
Sneak Attack: Hit inflicts +4d6 HP when foe flanked or denied Dex bonus

Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: -1
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +1
Iron Will: +2 Will
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +2
Concealed Thoughts: May control effect of spells that detect surface thoughts when cast on self
Elude Detection: May gain SR 25 (divination) at will
Fool Casting: Successful save vs. control spell allows partial effects, dismissible at well
Glib Lie: Truth-detecting magic requires DC 25 caster level check to be effective
Heart Of The Streets: +1 Reflex when adjacent to 2 allies
Hidden Mind: Immune to divination and mental effects
Mask Alignment: May cause alignment detection spells directed at self to report choice of alignment
Shift Alignment: May modify alignment to change alignment-specific effects of magic directed at self
Slippery Mind: Second save vs. enchantment
Well-Versed: +4 vs. bardic and sonic effects
Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 6; B1: 5; B2: 3 Spell DC: B: 12
Magic Notes:
Charisma Bard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level B1, B2
Simple Somatics: No arcane spell failure in light armor
Spell Focus (Illusion): +1 Spell DC (Illusion)
Assumption: May take aura of touched helpless creature, redirecting detection spells to self
Countersong: R30' Perform check vs. sonic magic while performing
Distraction: R30' Perform check vs. visual magic while performing
Fascinate: R90' Hold 2 creatures spellbound while performing (DC 14 Will neg)
Mockery: Bardic Performance inflicts -2 on target Charisma and Charisma-based skill checks
Nonmagical Aura: May use Magic Aura effects to mask aura 2/dy
Satire: Bardic Performance inflicts -2 on attack, damage, and saves vs. fear and charm on foes w/in hearing
Still Spell: Cast spell w/out movement uses +1 spell slot
Wide Audience: Bardic Performance affects 60' cone, 30' radius, or +0 targets
